cards.alt: Custom 2001 Chevrolet Silverado Is A Total Show-Off
Custom 2001 Chevrolet Silverado Is A Total Show-Off
Custom 2001 Chevrolet Silverado Is A Total Show-Off

sections: With custom paint, a professional engine build, and more.
is pleased to offer up this

show truck for sale. If you have been in the market for a vehicle that combines form, function, and show quality, then look no further. This Silverado will take you far and impress at the local car show; be prepared to have flocks of spectators around your truck and trophies to bring home. Even if car events aren’t your cup of tea, this bad boy will turn heads everywhere you go and perform as a perfect daily driver. It’s gorgeous, versatile, and utilitarian–what more could you ask for?

At first glance, the custom blue pearl paint catches your eye with its impeccable luster and smooth lines that hug the truck so well. This Silverado pickup has been lowered with a 5/7-inch drop and sits mean on 22-inch wheels. If you thought this was a stunner from the outside, you should see the inside of this 2001 Chevrolet Silverado. The cabin features custom red leather, a touch-screen double DIN dash with Apple Car Play, Escalade gauges, ice-cold air conditioning, power windows, and power locks.  What’s more, this pickup comes equipped with an alarm system and remote start for those super cold winter months or hot and sticky summer months. No matter the season, you’ll enter this Silverado in a comfortable manner.

is another work of art. It’s in excellent condition, clean, and tidy. The heart and soul of this truck is a 5.3-liter engine with forged internals and Texas Speed Stage 4 cams. The full motor was professionally built by a highly reputable performance shop. It’s mated to a built 4L80E transmission with a 3,200 rpm stall converter. If that wasn’t enough, this show-quality truck also received an LSA supercharger. That powerhouse combination results in a whopping 597 rwhp. This truck was professionally tuned as well and is ready to go.

This is a one-of-a-kind turn-key show truck that could run with some of the fastest cars on the street. Best believe that no expense was spared in building this truck. The current asking price is set at $19,900, and you can
